Packages 
Package Description
com.samsung.spen.lib.multiwindow  
com.samsung.spensdk.multiwindow_applistener  
com.samsung.spen.lib.multiwindow Package provide API for excuting or using to Popup form one or more application supported by preload the Multiwindow.
Also, It provide Drag & Drop API for exchange of data(image, text) in applications.

Attention
This package can be used Android version should be higher than Jelly Bean and Galaxy Note 10.1.

Please visit http://developer.samsung.com/android for questions.

Updated : 2012-08-30
